text: Vincenzo Sangermano (1758-1819) was a Roman Catholic priest from Italy. He was a Barnabite. He was a missionary in Burma from 1783-1806. ==Further reading== *Sangermano, Vincenzo and Nicholas Patrick Wiseman. The Burmese Empire a Hundred Years Ago. Westminister: A. Constable and Company (1893). *Sangermano, Vincenzo. A Description of the Burmese Empire. London: Oriental Translation Fund of Geat Britain and Ireland (1833). ==References== Category:Italian Roman Catholic priests Category:Roman Catholic missionaries Category:1758 births Category:1819 deaths Category:Province of Frosinone
title: Vincenzo Sangermano
